attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: ie., arrange a simple, consistent, coherent benefit system that does not penalise claimants for taking low paid jobs. The current arrangement, complicated by local and national input, involves a loss of more than £1.00 per £1.00 earned for claimants on, say, incapacity/housing/disability/council tax benefits. No wonder they see self-reliant work as a risky, unprofitable, worthless enterprise.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
